dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: The Stanford Natural Language Inference (SNLI) dataset contains 570K human annotated sentence pairs. The premises are drawn from the Flickr30k corpus, and then the hypotheses are manually composed for each relationship class (entailment, neutral, contradiction).
dcterms:title: Stanford Natural Language Inference (SNLI) dataset

dcterms:creator: Bryan A. Plummer

Chris M. Cervantes
Juan C. Caicedo
Julia Hockenmaier
Svetlana Lazebnik
dcterms:description: Flickr30k entities dataset collects region-to-phrase correspondences for richer image-to-sentence models.
dcterms:title: Flickr30k
